full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,CHOS MNGON PA'I MDZOD KYI RIG PA MI BZAD PA'I GTER SGO RNAM PAR 'BYED PA'I SDOM TSIG LE'UR BYAS PA ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @031A *, ,(CES PA 'DI YANG SKAL MNYAM DON GNYER CAN DAG LA PHAN PHYIR BSHES GNYEN SMRA BA'I DBANG PO SHRI LA BI DZA YA'I GSUNG THOR BU 'DUG PA RNAMS KYIS GZHI BYAS, DPE KLOG 'BA' ZHIG GIS MNGON PA'I DGONGS DON BLO LA 'DRIS KHRUL GYIS NYER MKHO DU MA ZHIG KHA SKONG SDE RGYAS SU BTANG BA 'DI YANG, SA MTHAR SKYES PA'I DGE SBYONGS KYI GZUGS BRNYAN CAN SU MA TI AA YU shE'AM, MING GZHAN MTSO BYUNG BLO LDAN KYIS YI GER 'KHOD PA DGE LEGS SU GYUR CIG ,SARBA MANGGA LAm, ,)
author_simple: SU MA TI AA YU shE,
